entry.title: I love you, I’m Sorry
entry.summary:
Author: Deathorcake

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,600Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: The storm had been slowly brewing all day. It began imperceptibly with the sense of peripheral foreboding that comes with a drop in air pressure. But as the mercury slowly fell throughout the day, Eddie’s anxiety levels rose. But as always, he’d tried his best to put it to the back of his mind, to concentrate on the tasks at hand and carry on with the shift as if nothing were amiss. He’d busied himself with cleaning and re stocking the ambulance and was relieved every time the tones went off as it meant he could click into work mode and forget about the growing feelings of dread washing over him. OR After Bobby Nash’s death, Chimney taking over as captain at the 118 and Chris leaving for college things are never quite the same for Eddie Diaz. But his best friend is there when he needs him, after all they promised to always have each others back.

entry.title: Second Chances
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 215,791Chapters: 33/?Kudos: 48

Summary: Bobby and Athena are just two people trying to put their lives back together while figuring out how to co-parent. What starts as a complicated plan to foster kids in need slowly turns into something much deeper. Through the ups and downs of heartbreak, healing, and raising children who’ve been through so much, they find strength in each other. Over time, their partnership grows into love, and together, they build a story about family, trust, and second chances.

entry.title: S2 Superwoman: Last Responder
entry.summary:
Author: That_bitch_without_a_life

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,587Chapters: 4/12Kudos: 52

Summary: “I know we haven’t been having that best of luck with partners for you yet, but I think today could really go well Buck.” Bobby says, catching her in between jobs. “Let me guess, I’m meeting him tomorrow whether I like it or not and it’s going to take us less than an hour to realise he’s a misogynist.” “Oh, are we better on Buck’s new work partner again, I bet he doesn’t even last through the first call with her.” Chimney says, Kleenex bottle in hand. “That’s rude Chim, I’ve run the maths and the average is at least two calls, give him that.” Kara responds much to Bobby’s charging. “How about you both give the new guy a chance, he’s fully fresh.” “Wait! Cap you’re giving me a Probie.” TLDR: this is a female buck fic if she was supergirl, just trust the process.

entry.title: Evergrowing
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 198,769Chapters: 33/?Kudos: 19

Summary: Athena and Bobby are learning that parenting doesn’t end when the kids turn eighteen. With three grown children and two still at home, Bobby and Athena find themselves navigating new challenges at every stage of life. Each child carries their own struggles, some spoken and some hidden, but together the family works through the ups and downs with love, patience, and resilience. At the heart of it all, they’re reminded that family is a bond that grows, shifts, and deepens, no matter how old the kids get.

entry.title: A Long Night on Sunset
entry.summary:
Author: chucks_prophet

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,347Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 49

Summary: EMS arrives on Sunset just after midnight. They have the where and what down; it’s the how and why that’s beyond his paygrade. All he and his team know is the Delta is a caucasian male in his mid-thirties with multiple stab wounds. Eddie’s job is to treat the patient, not ask questions beyond what’s medically necessary.“Sir, are you with me?”Normally he doesn’t get an answer to that, but hey, you have to try.

entry.title: Halloween Costume
entry.summary:
Author: inkinmyheartandonthepage

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,868Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 122

Summary: “What are you doing?” Hen asked, carefully sitting down behind Buck on the couch. Buck didn’t look up from the badge he was pinning in his hands. “Waf dob ib loob ike?” he said around the pins he had clenched between his teeth. He pulled out another one, pinning down another section of the badge. “It looks like you are sewing,” Hen said. “Why are you sewing?”   OR Buck makes Chris's Halloween costume.

entry.title: i've got sun in my motherfuckin' pocket
entry.summary:
Author: livelyvague

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,063Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 58

Summary: May Grant, a force of nature, the picture of calm and collected, always too mature for her age.  A pretty girl with a bright mind and an ambition that cannot be contained… yet somehow can’t hold down a man. She doesn’t need a man, doesn’t really want one, has never really wanted one if she's honest with herself. But everything is so close and she has to want this too. May has to want this, she has to put the last minute touches on the perfectly wrapped present of her life.or, May goes on a bad date with a dude that she knows is going to be bad, and she and Eddie talk and cry yayy

entry.title: city life, apple pie (baked just right)
entry.summary:
Author: whatwhyhelp

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,511Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 78

Summary: Buck’s insistence on making a perfect dessert didn’t stem from a need to impress or a desire for praise. It was a way to express his utter joy that his boys had come home and to show his gratitude for letting him be part of their little family for the past seven years. Even through the phone, Buck could see Christopher and Eddie buckling under the weight of living in El Paso, could hear the weariness in their voices after another disagreement with Helena and Ramon. For all they had been through, the Diazes deserved more than a random pick out of a list; they deserved something crafted with care, specifically chosen with them in mind, and Buck was determined to provide that for them. OR While waiting for Eddie and Christoper to return from El Paso, Buck bakes. A lot.

entry.title: hate me, love me, as long as you think about me
entry.summary:
Author: goforeddie

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,425Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 36

Summary: “What do you have to say after winning tonight? Are the Kings set to a good start of the season?” one of the journalist, Ethan if Eddie recognized his voice correctly, asked. That fucking 9 million a year contract smile was the first thing Eddie saw. The second was the shine in those baby blues people call his eyes. “Oh, I don’t know…” Evan Buckley said with faux modesty, “I think we’re off to destroy the Stars for the rest of the year, if they play like they did tonight.” A few chuckles, some flash from the camera and then another question, the same that always comes nowadays, “What about Diaz? Do you think he’ll save that team?” Buckley rolled his eyes at the question, then looked directly in the camera and said, “I doubt Diaz could save a sinking ship, even if he was made captain,” and then the TV was turned off. OR : a heated rivalry AU, where the two biggest star of the NHL - who happens to be rivals since their rookie year - eventually get into a sort of... enemies with benefits, then friends, then lovers... or maybe they were always lovers.

entry.title: Beneath Your Crown
entry.summary:
Author: tinygiantsam

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,424Chapters: 1/20Kudos: 9

Summary: "I do not belong to you, and I never will. We have a sacred duty to fulfill," exclaimed the Prince, maintaining his distance. They were being watched."You could," stated Edmundo, his voice barely above a whisper. "You are the heir to the throne, Evan. You could do as you please.""I could never abandon my Kingdom."The words were harsh, spoken with unyielding determination. He sighed, adjusting his cape with deliberate ease, as if to reclaim the decorum he had momentarily lost.Edmundo blinked, taking a step forward, his shoulders falling as he saw the other man recoil. "How dare you?"The royal opened and closed his mouth, unsure on how to respond. "How dare I?" he repeated, baffled."How dare you run from my touch when I have watched you reach heaven from it?"OR: Buck and Eddie are heirs to two crowns, each bound to their own kingdom. To unite the Spanish and English empires, a marriage is arranged between Prince Edmundo Díaz and Princess Madeleine Buckley. Unfortunately for everyone, the wrong princes fall in love (Includes enemies to lovers slow burn, forbidden romance, and eventual smut).
